However , limited evidence available effect dietary fatty acid insulin sensitivity secretion . The current study design investigate effect SFA versus MUFA versus CARB insulinemic response lipid metabolism healthy individual central obesity . Study design : A randomized , crossover , single blind design study carry . The subject consume controlled diet 6 week . They provide 3 meal per day weekday SFA , MUFA CARB diet assign randomly . Protein content standardise 14 % energy . The SFA MUFA diet provide 31.5 % energy intake fat , 69 % total fat replace test fat ( approximately 49 g/d base 2000 kcal basic diet ) . Each individual fatty acid provide approximately 7 % total energy intake . The CARB diet provide approximately 34 g/day experimental fat base 2000 kcal basic diet . The CARB diet replace 7 % energy carbohydrate total fat exchange oleic acid ( C18:1 ) . Hypothesis : Changing energy dietary fat ( SFA MUFA ) carbohydrate influence insulin sensitivity , endothelial vascular function , pro-inflammatory marker lipid metabolism differently individual metabolic syndrome . DOC.brief_title: Effects Dietary Fats Cardiovascular Health Insulin Sensitivity Subjects With Abdominal Obesity
DOC.criteria: 1 . Abdominally obese male female ( waist circumference > 90 cm male , > 80 cm female ) , 2 . Age 2060 year medical history cardiovascular disease , diabetes , dyslipidemia ; current use antihypertensive lipid lower medication ; plasma cholesterol > 6.5 mmol/L , TAG > 4.5 mmol/L ; alcohol intake exceed moderate intake ( > 28 unit per week ) ; pregnancy , smoker breastfeeding .
